DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effects of repeat doses of SB-659032 with placebo on platelet aggregation in subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of Rilapladib (SB-659032) On Platelet Aggregation
DOC.criteria: Subjects with QTc < 450 msec as measured at screening. History of asthma. Smokers.
